com.sponsorpay.sdk.android
Class SponsorPay

java.lang.Object
  com.sponsorpay.sdk.android.SponsorPay

public class SponsorPay
extends java.lang.Object

This class purpose is to create, handle and manage the SPCredentials objects.

It provide convenience methods for all the required operations through the use of static methods.

getCredentials

public static SPCredentials getCredentials(java.lang.String credentialsToken)
Return the SPCredentials identified by the credentials token ID or throws a RuntimeException if there's none.

Parameters:
credentialsToken - The token id of the credentials.
Returns:
the SPCredentials identified by the credentials token.

getCredentials

public static java.lang.String getCredentials(java.lang.String appId,
                                              java.lang.String userId,
                                              java.lang.String securityToken,
                                              android.content.Context context)
Deprecated. This method will be removed from a future release of the SDK.

Gets or creates a credentials object with the provided parameters and sets it as the current credentials. Throws an IllegalArgumentException if appId is null.

If a matching credentials object is found for the pair appId-userId, the securityToken is updated with the one provided as parameter (unless null is provided).

Parameters:
appId - Application ID assigned by SponsorPay. Provide null to read the Application ID from the Application Manifest.
userId - The ID of the user for which the delta of coins will be requested.
securityToken - Security Token associated with the provided Application ID. It's used to sign the requests and verify the server responses.
context - Android application context.
Returns:
the credentials token that identify the credentials for the provided parameters.

start

public static java.lang.String start(java.lang.String appId,
                                     java.lang.String userId,
                                     java.lang.String securityToken,
                                     android.content.Context context)

Gets or creates a credentials object with the provided parameters, initializes it with SponsorPay servers and sets it as the current credentials. Throws a IllegalArgumentException if appId is null.

If a matching credentials object is found for the pair appId-userId, the securityToken is updated with the one provided as parameter (unless null is provided).

Parameters:
appId - Application ID assigned by SponsorPay. Provide null to read the Application ID from the Application Manifest.
userId - The ID of the user for which the delta of coins will be requested.
securityToken - Security Token associated with the provided Application ID. It's used to sign the requests and verify the server responses.
context - Android application context.
Returns:
the credentials token that identify the credentials for the provided parameters.

getAllCredentials

public static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getAllCredentials()
Returns a set of all valid credentials token IDs

Returns:
